trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: ConnectionsZoneDesigner provides a design-time representation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control with a menu to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property for the convenience of the page developer.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionsZoneDesigner 提供的設計階段表示法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>具有存取功能表控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>集合和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>網頁開發人員的方便性，不論屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: It is the only zone designer that does not support designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 它是唯一不支援設計工具區域的區域設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls uses links to create connections instead of a drag-and-drop user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 這是因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>監護 用來建立連接，而不是拖放的使用者介面 (UI) 的連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property both appear on the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>集合和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>同時出現的動詞命令功能表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, when selected, provides a selection of color schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>選取，讓選取的色彩配置。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> check box, when selected, displays the contents of the control as it would appear in the browser; the control will be empty until a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>核取方塊，選取時，就會出現在瀏覽器中，顯示控制項的內容; 之前建立的連接時，控制項將會是空的。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from ConnectionsZoneDesigner to support a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control as with any other control designer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繼承自以支援自訂 ConnectionsZoneDesigner<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制如同其他控制項設計工具。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the markup that renders the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，以變更呈現控制項的標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> with a custom scheme.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>要加入集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>與自訂配置。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得之預先定義的自動格式化配置集合中顯示**自動格式化**在設計階段的相關聯控制項的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to get a predefined collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: 自動格式設定屬性覆寫其基底實作，以取得預先定義的集合的特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: A predefined <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> with a default ConnectionZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: 預先定義<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref>與預設 ConnectionZone 配置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來代表控制項設計階段的標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the markup to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>也就是來代表控制項設計階段標記。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 將設計工具繫結至指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref>設計工具關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏在設計階段的一組預設的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method overrides the parent method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties in the designer.
trans-unit.target: PreFilterProperties 方法會覆寫父方法以隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A>設計工具中的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because the properties in question are not rendered by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls and are therefore not relevant.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為有問題的屬性不會轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項並因此不相關。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>與控制項相關聯的屬性集。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
